    Aggregates payment via integration to the major card schemes.

    Upperlink Paygate aggregates payment via integration to the major card schemes.

    It not only supports the use of Visa cards, Mastercard and Verve cards, but also supports a unique kind of account to account payment in which a pseudo-account number that carries the name of the payer is generated on the fly and the payer can validate the account number and transfer funds to it from any banking app with the merchantâ€™s system updated in real-time immediately the transfer happens.

    Manage multiple bank account across different banks.

    The Bank Account Monitoring System BAMS is a solution developed to help Finance/Treasury Managers in their day to day management of multiple bank accounts across different banks. It also helps to improve efficiency in treasure management, tax remittance and prevents complications posed by contemporary finance management process.
